alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 1:48PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Converse County through 230 PM MDT... At 147 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Douglas, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Converse County. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 125 and 141. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
